title: Crusaders - Live In Japan (1981; 1993) [FLAC]
description:
The Crusaders - Ongaku Kai - Live in Japan
Label: MCA / Records - GRP 97462
Format: CD, Album
Country: Europe
Released: 1993
Genre: Jazz
Style: Soul-Jazz, Smooth Jazz


Recorded live January 18th, 1981 at NHK Hall Tokyo, Japan. Digital mastering & pressed at JVC in Japan. Covers come in embossed Gold relief design of Traditional Warrior.

7,9,10 Previously Unreleased Take 



Tracklist:

1 	Introduction 	
2 	Rainbow Seeker 	
3 	Hustler 	
4 	Sweet Gentle Love 	
5 	Drum Inroduction 	
6 	Spiral 	
7 	Melodies Of Love 	
8 	Carmel 	
9 	So Far Away 	
10 	Brazos River Breakdown 	
11 	In All My Wildest Dreams 	
12 	Put It Where You Want It


Lineup:

Wilton Felder - sax
Stix Hooper - drums
Joe Sample - keyboards
Alphonso Johnson - bass
Barry Finnerty - guitar
Roland Bautista - guitar
Rafael Cruz - percussion
